Suukie being the only one not moving at all, was hit by the acid and the
shots from the Sin Brothers. Suukie turned his head and stared, and then
went back to his shooting as the acid burnt through the shoulder that he
still had an arm attached to...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Sunday, June 11, 2000 10:38 PM
Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


> ::Mosquitor/Shredder::
>
> Mosquitor flies out of the predacon base. "Die invaders!!" He screams as
he
> shoots acid at the People's Group, mindlessly trying to hit all of them.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Shredder growls as he hears the shots from a hallway in the predacon base.
He
> takes off at a run to the nearest exit, arming his rifle.
